p: The judge also determined that all material and human resources necessary to fulfill and enable immediate functioning would be organized. He argued that the beds were not reserved for other purposes and the federated entities were not complying with the commitment they assumed to implement the Contingency Plans and that the principle of possible reserve did not apply in this case, considering that the federated entities committed themselves to implement health measures and to create the ICU/SRAG beds indicated in the Contingency Plan of the state of Rio de Janeiro.
